title: Cant Login
body:
Every time i try to log in on my laptop after waiting a while i get a message saying  "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server." 
but when i login on my brothers computer it works please help

replies.body: What OS is your computer on?
Do you have Windows Firewall enabled? Try letting all of League's exe files through that. Also, disable any third-party firewalls and/or anti-viruses you may have enabled also, and try again.
Same for me... Was in the middle of an urf fight and suddenly went down. I'm on windows and everything worked fine up until that one game
